name: RGB CO-OP
description:
In this game, you can only kill enemies with the same color as you, but they can kill you regardless of color, trust your friend to protect you

Player 1 controls:
wasd - move and shoot
q - spin
e - change the weapon

player 2:
arrow keys - move and shoot
< - spin
> - change the weapon

player 3 (yes, local player 3):
8462- move and shoot
0 - spin
5 - change the weapon
